description: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Inheritance
tagline: Some Secrets Should Stay Buried.
description: A patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy the family.

title: Baywatch
tagline: Get your guard on
description: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.

title: The Hangover
tagline: I stole a police car?!
description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
tagline: I'm fine without you.
description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

title: The Imitation Game
tagline: Behind every code is an enigma
description: During World War II, the English mathematical genius

title: The Thing
tagline: Man is The Warmest Place to Hide.
description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: Frozen
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: Underworld U.S.A.
tagline: The Threat To a Nation!
description: A teenager who witnesses the murder of his father vows to exact revenge on the four mobsters involved in the killing.

title: The Sixth Sense
tagline: Now you believe in ghosts
description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
tagline: Based on the novel by Michael Crichton.

description: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie follows fugitive Jesse Pinkman as he runs from his captors, the law and his past.

title: Atomic Blonde

description: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
tagline: The hunt begins.
description: As Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint), and Hermione (Emma Watson) race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

title: Ma

description: A lonely woman befriends a group of teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

title: The Dead Don't Die
tagline: The Greatest Zombie Cast Ever Disassembled
description: The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.

title: X-Men: Apocalypse

description: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

title: The Circle

title: The Addams Family
tagline: Think your family is weird? Think again.
description: The eccentrically macabre family moves to a bland suburb where Wednesday Addams' friendship with the daughter of a hostile and conformist local reality show host exacerbates conflict between the families.

title: The Kitchen
description: The wives of New York gangsters in Hell's Kitchen in the 1970s continue to operate their husbands' rackets after they're locked up in prison.

title: Fighting with My Family

description: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

title: The High Note

title: Sucker Punch
tagline: A mind bending vision of reality from the director of Watchmen & 300.
description: A young girl institutionalized by her abusive stepfather retreats to an alternative reality as a coping strategy and envisions a plan to help her escape.

title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin

description: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

title: Speed

description: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
tagline: Crime, passion and lust for power - Sergio Leone's explosive saga of gangland America.
description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan

description: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

title: Despicable Me

description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

title: A Matter of Life and Death
tagline: The First British Royal Command Film
description: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.

title: The Banker

description: In the 1960s two African-American entrepreneurs hire a working-class white man to pretend to be the head of their business empire while they pose as a janitor and chauffeur.

description: When the world's best spy is turned into a pigeon, he must rely on his nerdy tech officer to save the world.

title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies

description: Bilbo and company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

title: Long Shot
tagline: Feel something different.

title: 21 Jump Street

description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

title: Man on Fire
tagline: Sabotage his work, his fire will be released.
description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Wind River

title: Murder on the Orient Express

description: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

title: The Sandlot
tagline: The adventure of a lifetime, the summer of their dreams...the dog of their nightmares

title: Mid90s
tagline: Fall. Get back up.
description: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 1990s-era Los Angeles who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop.

title: Dead Poets Society

title: Mission: Impossible
tagline: Expect the Impossible
description: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

title: The Post

description: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between the press and the government.

description: A group of eccentric assassins are fed up with Gunther, the world's greatest hitman, and decide to kill him, but their plan turns into a series of bungled encounters as Gunther seems to always be one step ahead.

title: Power Rangers

description: A group of high-school students, who are infused with unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.

title: Nocturnal Animals
tagline: When you love someone you can't just throw it away

title: Climax
description: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

title: Spotlight
tagline: Break the story. Break the silence.
description: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

title: The Magnificent Seven
tagline: Justice has a number.
description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

title: Looper

description: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits - someone like Joe - who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by sending back Joe's future self for assassination.

title: Beats

title: The Room
description: Matt and Kate buy an isolated house. While moving, they discover a strange room that grants them an unlimited number of material wishes. But, since Kate has had two miscarriages, what they miss the most is a child.

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

description: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

title: Monos
description: On a remote mountaintop, eight kids with guns watch over a hostage and a conscripted milk cow.

title: The Incredibles
tagline: Discover the Side of Superheroes You've Never Seen Before
description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: I, Tonya
tagline: Fitting in is overrated
description: Competitive ice skater

title: Blank Check
tagline: Every kid's dream... Every parents nightmare!
description: A young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters to whom it belongs are in pursuit.

title: The Kissing Booth
tagline: She can tell her best friend anything. Except this one thing.
description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

title: Tangled
tagline: They're taking adventure to new lengths.
description: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: The Lobster

title: Suspiria

description: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist. Some will succumb to the nightmare. Others will finally wake up.

title: The Devil Wears Prada

title: Mother!
tagline: seeing is believing
description: A couple's relationship is tested when uninvited guests arrive at their home, disrupting their tranquil existence.

title: Sleepy Hollow
tagline: Köpfe werden rollen ! (Heads will roll.)
description: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people, with the culprit being the legendary apparition, The Headless Horseman.

title: Sex Drive
tagline: He's leaving virgin territory
description: A high school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

title: L.A. Confidential
tagline: It's a crime saga that will shock you.  It's a mystery that will keep you guessing.  It's a thriller that will keep you riveted.
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Beach Party
tagline: The perfect summer when the urge meets the surge!
description: The first of the five official American-International "Beach Party" movies. Anthropology Professor Robert Orwell Sutwell and his secretary Marianne are studying the sex habits of teenagers....

tagline: Midnight is just the beginning.

title: The Exorcist

title: Constantine

title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb

title: Jackie Brown

title: The Last Samurai

title: Escape from Pretoria

description: Based on the real-life prison break of two political captives, Escape From Pretoria is a race-against-time thriller set in the tumultuous apartheid days of South Africa.

title: Rush
tagline: Based on a true story.
description: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals

title: Idiocracy
tagline: The Future Is A No Brainer
description: Private Joe Bauers, the definition of "average American", is selected by the Pentagon to be the guinea pig for a top-secret hibernation program. Forgotten, he awakes five centuries in the future. He discovers a society so incredibly dumbed down that he's easily the most intelligent person alive.

title: Weird Science
tagline: It's purely sexual (UK)
description: Two high school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, but she turns their lives upside down.

title: The Informer
tagline: Choose Your Enemies Wisely
description: An ex-convict working undercover intentionally gets himself incarcerated again in order to infiltrate the mob at a maximum security prison.

title: Undercover Grandpa
tagline: Get the girl. Save the world.
description: When the girl he likes goes missing, Jake enlists the help of his grandpa and Grandpa's former special ops buddies.

title: Dangerous Lies
description: When a wealthy elderly man dies and unexpectedly leaves his estate to his new caregiver, she's drawn into a web of deception and murder. If she's going to survive, she'll have to question everyone's motives - even the people she loves.

title: Deep Impact

title: Showgirls

title: Manchester by the Sea
tagline: Breathtaking... A truly incredible piece of cinema!
description: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

title: Night Hunter
description: A weathered Lieutenant, his police force, and a local vigilante are all caught up in a dangerous scheme involving a recently arrested, troubled man who's linked to years of female abductions and murders.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
tagline: At the End of the World, the Adventure Begins
description: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

title: Caddyshack
tagline: Playing A Round Of Golf At The Bushwood Club Isn't Just Confined To The Golf Course!
description: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2
tagline: The epic finale that will live forever
description: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

title: Legend

title: Dallas Buyers Club

title: Under the Skin
description: A mysterious young woman seduces lonely men in the evening hours in Scotland. However, events lead her to begin a process of self-discovery.

title: Troop Zero

title: Slumdog Millionaire

title: The Matrix Revolutions
tagline: Everything that has a beginning has an end.
description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

title: Bright
description: A detective must work with an Orc to find a powerful wand before evil creatures do.

title: Hitch
tagline: The cure for the common man.
description: While helping his latest client woo the woman of his dreams, a professional "date doctor" finds that his game doesn't quite work on the gossip columnist with whom he's smitten.

title: Lincoln
description: As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

title: X-Men: The Last Stand
tagline: Whose Side Will You Be On?
description: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

title: Slender Man
description: In a small town in Massachusetts, a group of friends, fascinated by the internet lore of the Slender Man, attempt to prove that he doesn't actually exist - until one of them mysteriously goes missing.

title: Newness
description: In contemporary Los Angeles, two millennials navigating a social media-driven hookup culture begin a relationship that pushes both emotional and physical boundaries.

title: The Gift
tagline: The Sins Of The Past Will Become Your Present.
description: A young married couple's lives are thrown into a harrowing tailspin when an acquaintance from the husband's past brings mysterious gifts and a horrifying secret to light after more than 20 years.

title: Time Bandits

title: Fantastic Four
tagline: When an experimental space voyage goes wrong, four people are dramatically changed by cosmic rays to become the Fantastic Four.
description: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

title: Passengers
tagline: Every Moment Counts
description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

title: Saw
tagline: Live or die. Make your choice.
description: Two strangers, who awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

title: Brazil
tagline: Suspicion breeds confidence.
description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

title: West Side Story
tagline: Watch this shot now. Hey. Shoot, man. Go. Hey, yeah.
description: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: Little Women
tagline: Save a place in your heart for the unforgettable story of these... LITTLE WOMEN
description: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

title: Glory
tagline: Their innocence. Their heritage. Their lives. Nothing would be spared in the fight for their freedom.

title: Carol
tagline: Some people change your life forever
description: An aspiring photographer develops an intimate relationship with an older woman in 1950s New York.

title: Notting Hill
tagline: Can the most famous film star in the world fall for just an ordinary guy?
description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

title: Conan the Barbarian
tagline: Enter An Age Undreamed Of
description: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

title: Hotel Transylvania
tagline: Where monsters go to get away from it all
description: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.

title: In Bruges
tagline: Shoot first. Sightsee later.
description: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

title: Serenity
tagline: They aim to misbehave.
description: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their members who is telepathic.

title: A River Runs Through It
tagline: The Story of an American Family.
description: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

title: Toy Story 3
tagline: Be The First To Meet Fourteen New Characters.
description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Burlesque
tagline: In a city of dreams and beyond your imagination, there exists a magical world that comes to life.
description: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

title: The Maze Runner
tagline: Get ready to run.
description: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning they're all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow "runners" for a shot at escape.

title: Natural Born Killers

description: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

title: The Professor and the Madman

description: Professor James Murray begins work compiling words for the first edition of the Oxford English Dictionary in the mid-19th century, and receives over 10,000 entries from a patient at Broadmoor Criminal Lunatic Asylum, Dr. William Minor.

title: Chinatown

description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: The Machinist
tagline: How do you wake up from a nightmare, if you're not asleep?
description: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

title: Moulin Rouge!
tagline: Truth - Beauty - Freedom - Love
description: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets.

title: Blow the Man Down
description: Mary Beth and Priscilla Connolly attempt to cover up a gruesome run-in with a dangerous man. To conceal their crime, the sisters must go deep into the criminal underbelly of their hometown, uncovering the town's darkest secrets.

title: Magic Mike

description: A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.

title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
tagline: Desire. Defy. Escape.
description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
tagline: The most astonishing, innovative, backyard adventure of all time!
description: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man
tagline: The untold story begins.
description: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

title: Alien: Resurrection

description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

title: Happy Gilmore

title: The Mule

description: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

title: The Princess Diaries

description: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her sixteenth year.

title: As Good as It Gets

description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

description: The life of

description: The story of Sir

title: The Hot Spot
tagline: Film Noir Like You've Never Seen.
description: Upon arriving to a small town, a drifter quickly gets into trouble with the local authorities - and the local women - after he robs a bank.

title: Good Luck Chuck

description: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

title: The Soloist
tagline: No one changes anything by playing it safe
description: A newspaper journalist discovers a homeless musical genius and tries to improve his situation.

title: I'm Not There
tagline: All I Can Do Is Be Me Whoever That Is
description: Ruminations on the life of

title: A Perfect Ending
description: Rebecca has a very unusual secret, one that not even her best friends know about. The last person on earth she expects to reveal it to is a high priced escort named Paris.

title: Iron Sky
tagline: The world is sick. And we are the doctors.
description: The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.

title: The Gunman
tagline: Guard the truth.
description: A sniper on a mercenary assassination team, kills the minister of mines of the Congo. Terrier's successful kill shot forces him into hiding. Returning to the Congo years later, he becomes the target of a hit squad himself.

title: The Joneses
tagline: Some families are too good to be true
description: A seemingly perfect family moves into a suburban neighborhood, but when it comes to the truth as to why they're living there, they don't exactly come clean with their neighbors.

title: Get Carter
tagline: The Truth Hurts
description: A Las Vegas mob enforcer travels back to his hometown to investigate his brother's mysterious death.

title: Lucas
tagline: It's about falling in love...for the first time.
description: A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.

title: Heartbreakers
tagline: Caution: Dangerous curves ahead.
description: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

title: Carrie Pilby
tagline: Live your life before it passes you by
description: A person of high intelligence struggles to make sense of the world as it relates to morality, relationships, sex and leaving her apartment.

title: The Deep
tagline: Is the treasure worth the terror? [Video Australia]
description: In Bermuda, two amateur treasure-hunting divers have a run-in with local criminals when they inadvertently discover the secret cargo of a World War II shipwreck.

title: Kon-Tiki

description: Legendary explorer Thor Heyerdal's epic 4,300-mile crossing of the Pacific on a balsawood raft in 1947, in an effort to prove that it was possible for South Americans to settle in Polynesia in pre-Columbian times.

title: The Manchurian Candidate
tagline: When you've seen it all, you'll swear there's never been anything like it!
description: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

title: Waitress
tagline: The Year's Most Delicious Romantic Comedy
description: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
tagline: For seven strangers, this is just the beginning of an exotic adventure.
description: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

title: Bridget Jones's Baby
tagline: One Little Bump. One Big Question.
description: Bridget's focus on single life and her career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch ... she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

title: Suite Française
tagline: From the director of The Duchess.
description: During the early years of Nazi occupation of France in World War II, romance blooms between Lucile Angellier (

title: Psycho II
tagline: The mystery continues...
description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

title: Wayne's World 2
tagline: You'll laugh again!  You'll cry again!!  You'll hurl again!!!
description: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

title: Hud
tagline: The man with the barbed wire soul!
description: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

title: We Are Your Friends
tagline: It's Your World
description: Caught between a forbidden romance and the expectations of his friends, aspiring DJ Cole Carter attempts to find the path in life that leads to fame and fortune.

title: Rollerball

description: In a corporate-controlled future, an ultra-violent sport known as Rollerball represents the world, and one of its powerful athletes is out to defy those who want him out of the game.

title: Excision
tagline: Heal the sickness.
description: A disturbed and delusional high school student with aspirations of a career in medicine goes to extremes to earn the approval of her controlling mother.

title: Extra Ordinary
tagline: it is all in the guts
description: Rose, a mostly sweet and lonely Irish driving instructor, must use her supernatural talents to save the daughter of Martin (also mostly sweet and lonely) from a washed-up rock star who is using her in a Satanic pact to reignite his fame.

title: Hit and Run
tagline: When the s**t hits the fan, get ready to run.
description: Former getaway driver Charles Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charles' former gang chase them on the road.

title: Irrational Man
description: A tormented philosophy professor finds a will to live when he commits an existential act.

title: The To Do List
tagline: She's going from straight A's to her first F.
description: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.

title: The Bye Bye Man
tagline: The evil behind the most unspeakable acts has a name
description: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

title: The Hunger
tagline: Nothing Human Loves Forever
description: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

title: Masterminds
tagline: They' re so Dumb, it's Criminal!
description: A guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history. Based on the October 1997 Loomis Fargo robbery.

title: THX 1138
tagline: A Love Story Filmed on Location in the 21st Century
description: In the twenty-fifth century, a time when people have designations instead of names, a man, THX 1138, and a woman, LUH 3417, rebel against their rigidly controlled society.

title: Naked
tagline: It's Deja' Groom all over Again.
description: Nervous about finally getting married, a guy is forced to relive the same nerve-wracking hours over and over again until he gets things right on his wedding day.

title: The Hills Have Eyes
tagline: The lucky ones died first...
description: On the way to California, a family has the misfortune to have their car break down in an area closed to the public, and inhabited by violent savages ready to attack.

title: Solaris
tagline: There are no answers. Only Choices.
description: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

title: Fright Night

description: When a nice new neighbor moves in next door, Charley discovers that he is an ancient vampire who preys on the community. Can he save his neighborhood from the creature with the help of the famous "vampire killer", Peter Vincent?

title: The Windermere Children
description: This is the stark, moving ultimately redemptive story of the bonds these children make with one another, and of how the friendships forged at Windermere become a lifeline to a fruitful future.

title: A Perfect Murder
tagline: Husband. Wife. Lover. A Dangerous Affair. A Perfect Murder.
description: A wealthy Wall Street speculator discovers that his wife has a lover. He investigates him and uses the carrot and stick to make him murder his wife. Planned to detail, it seems like a perfect murder.

title: The Words
tagline: There's more than one way to take a life.
description: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

title: Timecop
tagline: Turn back the clock, and you're history.
description: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

title: Bad Lieutenant

description: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption.

title: Runaway Train

title: CBGB

description: A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.

title: Victoria
tagline: One girl. One city. One night. One take.
description: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

title: Forever Young
tagline: Time waits for no man but true love waits forever
description: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

title: Bringing Out the Dead
tagline: Saving a Life is the Ultimate Rush
description: Haunted by the patients he failed to save, an extremely burned-out Manhattan ambulance paramedic fights to maintain his sanity over three fraught and turbulent nights.

title: Brain on Fire
description: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

title: Domestic Disturbance
tagline: He will do anything to protect his family.
description: When Danny witnesses his stepfather Rick murder a man, Danny's father Frank has to protect his son from the greatest danger.

title: Street Kings
tagline: Their City. Their Rules. No Prisoners.
description: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the death of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

title: The Big Wedding
tagline: It's never too late to start acting like a family.
description: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
tagline: Because if Aquaman can get a movie, anyone can.
description: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

title: Wish Upon
tagline: Be careful what you wish for
description: A teenage girl discovers a box that carries magic powers and a deadly price for using them.

title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman

description: The time-travelling adventures of an advanced canine and his adopted son, as they endeavor to fix a time rift they created.

title: Entrapment
tagline: Oh, what a tangled web we weave, when first we practice to deceive. Then again, practice makes perfect.
description: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

title: A Place in the Sun
tagline: I'm in trouble, George... bad trouble
description: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

title: Hair
tagline: The "Star Wars" of movie musicals! [Australia Theatrical]
description: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

title: George Washington Slept Here

description: When Bill and Connie Fuller are forced to move out of their Manhattan apartment because of their pet dog, Connie persuades Bill to buy a dilapidated old Pennsylvania house that George Washington allegedly slept in.

title: Harsh Times
description: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

title: Look Who's Talking
tagline: He's hip, he's cool, and he's only 3 months old.
description: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice-over.

tagline: A TRIPLE ACADEMY AWARD-WINNER!
description: Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

title: My Bodyguard

title: Jungle 2 Jungle

description: A man learns he has a thirteen-year-old son who was raised in the jungle and brings the boy to New York City, turning his life upside down in the process.

title: The Great Gatsby
tagline: Gone is the romance that was so divine.
description: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

title: Virtuosity
tagline: Justice needs a new program
description: When a virtual reality simulation created using the personalities of multiple serial killers manages to escape into the real world, an ex-cop is tasked with stopping its reign of terror.

title: The Slumber Party Massacre
tagline: The Ultimate Driller Killer Thriller
description: A high school student's slumber party turns terrifying as an escaped mental patient with a drill decides to crash the evening.

title: Higher Learning
tagline: Question The Knowledge
description: People from all different walks of life, encounter racial tension, rape, responsibility, and the meaning of an education on a university campus.

title: The Rescuers Down Under
description: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

title: Hamlet
description: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

title: Breaking the Waves
tagline: Love is a mighty power.
description: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

title: The Woman in Red
tagline: Shy, quiet Teddy Pierce wanted a little adventure. And one day it walked into his life in a red silk dress. Now his wife is packing a gun. His friends are going nuts trying to cover for him and he's about to get caught with his pants down on the six o'clock news. Be very careful of what you want... Because you just might get it.
description: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte, an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her, but what would his wife say?

title: Shelter
description: When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.

title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
tagline: Some legends can never be tamed.
description: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

title: OtherLife

title: You Again

title: The Legend of Billie Jean

title: Pathfinder

title: Blow Out

title: Once

title: Kiss of Death

title: In the Bedroom
tagline: A young man.  An older woman.  Her ex-husband.  Things are about to explode...
description: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil

description: A crime boss teams up with a cop to track down a serial killer.

title: Notorious

description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: Hudson Hawk

title: The Ringer
tagline: Special has been redefined.
description: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

title: Quarantine

title: Staying Alive

description: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

title: One-Eyed Jacks
tagline: The motion picture that starts its own tradition of greatness.
description: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

title: The Major and the Minor
tagline: Is She A Kid - Or Is She Kidding?
description: A woman disguises herself as a child to save on a train fare and is taken in charge by an army man who doesn't notice the truth.

title: She's Funny That Way

description: On the set of a playwright's new project, a love triangle forms between his wife, her ex-lover, and the call girl-turned-actress cast in the production.

title: Rio Lobo
tagline: Give 'Em Hell, John.
description: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

title: New Jack City

description: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

title: Of Mice and Men

description: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, try to make money working the fields during the Depression so they can fulfill their dreams.

title: The Belko Experiment
tagline: This Is Not A Drill
description: In a twisted social experiment, eighty Americans are locked in their high-rise corporate office in Bogotá, Colombia, and ordered by an unknown voice coming from the company's intercom system to participate in a deadly game of kill or be killed.

title: The Woman
tagline: Hell Hath No Fury...
description: When a successful country lawyer captures and attempts to "civilize" the last remaining member of a violent clan that has roamed the Northeast coast for decades, he puts the lives of his family in jeopardy.

title: Magnum Force
tagline: This time the bullets are hitting pretty close to home!
description: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

title: Sabotage
tagline: Leave no loose ends
description: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

title: Sid and Nancy
tagline: Love kills
description: The relationship between

title: Clockers
tagline: When there's murder on the streets, everyone is a suspect.
description: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

title: Sorcerer
tagline: WANTED. Four men willing to drive a cargo of death to escape a life in hell.
description: Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous South American jungle.

title: Tristan & Isolde
tagline: When Fate Betrays Your Heart...Destiny Leaves You No Choice...LOVE CONQUERS ALL
description: An affair between the second in line to Britain's throne and the princess of the feuding Irish spells doom for the young lovers.

title: Up in Smoke
tagline: DON'T go straight to see this film!
description: Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.

title: Spun
tagline: the ultimate speed freak's tale.
description: A drug dealer introduces one of his customers, a 'speed freak', to the man who runs the meth lab. A crazy three-day adventure ensues.

title: Loving Annabelle
tagline: The controversial story of a highly accomplished Catholic school teacher, who falls in love with her student, Annabelle.
description: The intelligent Annabelle starts in an elite Catholic girls' boarding high school after being expelled from the previous 2 schools. She's open about being lesbian. She's attracted to her teacher, Simone.

title: Big Momma's House
tagline: He's Deep Undercover.
description: In order to protect a beautiful woman and her son from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as a large grandmother.

title: Girl
description: A promising teenage dancer enrolls at a prestigious ballet school while grappling with her gender dysphoria.

title: Thirst
tagline: Lusting after sinful pleasures.
description: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

title: Ravenous
tagline: Eat up.
description: In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

title: Thank God It's Friday
tagline: After 5000 years of civilization, we all need a break.
description: A Friday in the life of the disco club the Zoo, where the staff and clients meet and dance their their lives away.

title: Bowfinger

description: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

title: Rob Roy

description: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

title: The Specialist

description: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

title: The Whistlers

description: Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception.

title: Charlotte's Web

description: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

title: Maps to the Stars
tagline: Eventually stars burn out.
description: A tour into the heart of a Hollywood family chasing celebrity, one another and the relentless ghosts of their pasts.

title: Breaking Away

description: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

title: Ask Me Anything

description: A confused teenager writes a blog revealing her daily activities and secrets, advised to do so by her high school guidance counselor in lieu of moving onto her first year in college.

title: The Prince and Me

description: At college Paige meets Eddie, a fellow student from Denmark, whom she first dislikes but later accepts, likes, and loves; he proves to be Crown Prince Edvard. Paige follows him to Copenhagen, and he follows her back to school with a plan.

title: Saw III

description: Jigsaw abducts a doctor in order to keep himself alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen named Jeff through a brutal test.

title: Lucky Day

description: Red, a safe cracker who has just been released from prison, is trying to hold his family together as his past catches up with him in the form of Luc, a psychopathic contract killer who's seeking revenge for the death of his brother.

title: Bereavement

description: The horrific account of 6 year old Martin Bristol, abducted from his backyard swing and forced to witness the brutal crimes of a deranged madman.

title: Beginners

description: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

title: Starred Up

description: Eric Love, 19, is locked up in prison. On first day he assaults another inmate and several guards. He's offered group therapy and his dad, an inmate as well, tries to talk sense into him. Can he be rehabilitated?

title: Arizona
tagline: The heat is on. But it's a dry heat.
description: Set in the midst of the 2009 housing crisis, this darkly comedic story follows Cassie Fowler, a single mom and struggling realtor whose life goes off the rails when she witnesses a murder.

title: Laggies
tagline: A comedy about acting your age and other adult decisions
description: In the throes of a quarter-life crisis, Megan panics when her boyfriend proposes, then, taking an opportunity to escape for a week, hides out in the home of her new friend, 16-year-old Annika, who lives with her world-weary single dad.

title: A Bad Moms Christmas

description: As their own mothers drop in unexpectedly, our three under-appreciated and over-burdened moms rebel against the challenges and expectations of the Super Bowl for mothers: Christmas.

title: The Little Prince

description: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

title: Rosewater

title: Dolemite
tagline: With his All-Girl Army of Kung Fu Killers.
description: After he is released from jail, a pimp takes on the criminals and corrupt police officers who framed him in the first place.

title: Alex Cross
tagline: Don't Ever Cross Alex Cross
description: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.

title: Babylon A.D.
tagline: Save the World One Child at a Time.
description: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

title: Kill Your Darlings
tagline: A true story of obsession and murder
description: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.

title: The Perfect Score
tagline: The S.A.T is hard to take.  It's even harder to steal.
description: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

title: Watership Down
tagline: From the novel that enthralled the world, comes an animation classic.
description: A group of rabbits flee their doomed warren and face many dangers to find and protect their new home.

title: Teorema
tagline: There are only 923 words spoken in "Teorema" - but it says everything!
description: A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?

title: The Lion in Winter
tagline: The most significant reserved seat attraction of the year!
description: 1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.

title: Ride Along
tagline: Propose to this cop's sister? Rookie mistake.
description: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

title: Broken Flowers
tagline: Sometimes life brings some strange surprises.
description: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

title: Slap Shot
tagline: If this movie doesn't make you laugh, you better look up a psychiatric!!
description: A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.

title: Flubber
tagline: What is flubber?
description: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: The Amityville Horror
tagline: From the bestseller that made millions believe in the unbelievable.
description: Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

title: Bullet Head
tagline: There is no such thing as the perfect heist.
description: Three career criminals find themselves trapped in a warehouse with the law closing in and an even worse threat waiting inside - a nigh unstoppable killer dog.

title: Wind
description: Romance and adventure happen during the America's Cup series of yachting races.

title: Escape Room
tagline: Escape From This Game Or Die
description: Six friends test their intelligence when an escape room they participate in takes a dark and twisted turn.

title: My Girl 2
tagline: There's being a kid. There's being an adult. And then there's that year in between.
description: Vada Sultenfuss must go to LA to stay with her Uncle Phil to do some research on her mother's life, but finds much more.

title: Marked Woman
tagline: The Kind Ladies Don't Talk To!
description: A crusading DA persuades a clip joint "party girl" to testify against her mobster boss after her innocent sister is accidentally murdered during one of his unsavory "parties".

title: Victor Frankenstein
tagline: Discover the origin of the monster and his creation.
description: Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled young assistant's dark origins, his redemptive friendship with the young medical student Viktor Von Frankenstein, and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how Frankenstein became the man - and the legend - we know today.

title: Casanova
tagline: There's no greater adventure than true love.
description: The fabled romantic

title: Fist Fight
tagline: After school. Parking lot. It's on.
description: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.

title: The Bookshop
tagline: A town that lacks a bookshop isn't always a town that wants one.
description: England 1959. In a small East Anglian town, Florence Green decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop.

title: Oliver!
tagline: "OLIVER!" is the Best Picture of the Year! [post-Oscar]
description: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

title: Into the Grizzly Maze
tagline: From the Director of Saw V
description: Two estranged brothers reunite at their childhood home in the Alaskan wild. They set out on a two-day hike and are stalked by an unrelenting grizzly bear.

title: Ransom
tagline: This Fall, pay the price
description: Multi-millionaire Tom Mullen's son is kidnapped, but after initially agreeing to pay the ransom Mullen then decides to use the ransom money as a bounty.

title: Bandits
tagline: Two's Company, Three's A Crime.
description: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.
